call_summary.final_outcome: The caller inquired about a settlement offer. The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to the attorney three times. The transfers did not connect. The receptionist then informed the caller that the attorney was reviewing the offer and would call back. The caller stated she would be available on Friday.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist made three sequential attempts to transfer the caller to the attorney. After the transfers failed to connect, the receptionist provided a status update and noted a callback for the caller.
